note.p: Italian political refugee. One of a group of Italian political emigrants who were forced to leave Italy and fought on the constitutional side in the Spain. Resident in London for a time. Married Maria Lister (b. 1806; daughter of William Lister and Elizabeth Solly) in London in 1849. Professor of Italian literature, 1851.
Census returns of England and Wales 1851 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/1507/208/21)
England & Wales, non-conformist and non-parochial registers, 1567–1970 (Ancestry.com, accessed 6 December 2019)
The Times, 26 April 1851, p. 6; 10 March 1869, p. 4.
